value.title: Researchers use machine learning to unlock the genomic code in clinical cancer samples
value.excerpt: A new paper from University of Helsinki, published today in Nature Communications, suggests a method for accurately analyzing genomics data in cancer archival biopsies. This tool uses machine learning methods to correct damaged DNA and unveil the true mutation processes in tumor samples.

value.title: What Deep Learning Algorithms Can Teach Us About Snow

value.title: AI Detects Rare Birth Defects in Fetal Ultrasound
value.excerpt: A new study demonstrates how AI deep learning can be used to diagnose a rare embryonic developmental disorder called cystic hygroma within the first trimester of pregnancy from fetal ultrasound images.
